explanatory comments/crosstagging: It wasn't just the wilderness that was constructed or re-constructed and thereby tamed. The domestication of the landscape was also accomplished through architecture and town planning, both of which often aimed to create a piece of England in the heart of the Indian landscape. The image of the church in Chakrota in the postcard reproduced here bears more than a passing resemblance to a postcard of the 11th century Cocking church in West Sussex. (Shashwati Talukdar)(gs)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: This image belies the fact that it is at an elevation of almost 8000 feet, and not at the elevation of the church and garden in Surrey it is mimicking, which is at 400 feet. (Shashwati Talukdar)(gs)
